casebody.data:
STATE
v.
KING 2019-0171 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 3, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On motion for leave to file delayed appeal. Motion granted. Appellant shall file a memorandum in support of jurisdiction within 30 days. Appellant's motion requesting trial transcript denied. DONNELLY, J., would grant appellant's motion requesting trial transcript.

FISCHER, J., dissents and would deny appellant's motion for delayed appeal and appellant's motion requesting trial transcript.

STEWART, J., dissents and would deny appellant's motion for delayed appeal and deny appellant's motion requesting trial transcript as moot.
